message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
I'll take a smaller share this round, but I'm still hoping to get a better deal later on.
Let's try a 50/50 split this time.  Inflation is starting to hurt, and a fair deal seems like the best way forward.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share considering the initial offer was 60/40 in your favor.
I'm starting to feel the pressure of inflation.  Let's split it 60/40 this time, in your favor. It's the only way to avoid losing more money with each passing round.
